name: Kasol
title: Mini Israel in Himachal Pradesh
description: The hill-hamlet of Kasol stands at over 1,580 meters above sea level, in Himachal Pradesh, and flaunts raw natural beauty with lush conifer forests, snow-capped Himalayan mountains and winding rivers.

name: Shimla
title: Hub of Natural Bounties and Winter Sports
description: The erstwhile British ‘Summer Capital’ is packed with colonial-era architectural marvels, picturesque hilly hotspots, and a toy train tagged as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Wayanad
title: Green Paradise in North-East Kerala
description: Located on the southern tip of the Deccan plateau, Wayanad is home to clear lakes, dense jungles, and deep valleys. This weekend getaway from Bengaluru, is a paradise for trekkers.

name: Gulmarg
title: Heaven in the White Hills of Kashmir
description: Gulmarg is the crowning glory of Jammu & Kashmir and is located 2,650 meters above sea level. Known as the “Meadow of Flowers”, it boasts of the world’s highest golf-course.

name: Coonoor
title: A Serene Hill Station in Tamil Nadu
description: Gulmarg is the crowning glory of Jammu & Kashmir and is located 2,650 meters above sea level. Known as the “Meadow of Flowers”, it boasts of the world’s highest golf-course.

name: Goa
title: Popular for Beaches & Nightlife
description: Popularly known as India’s party capital, Goa seduces travellers from all around the globe with its boho beaches, ancient churches, majestic forts and unbeatable nightlife!

name: Maldives
title: A Stunning Tropical Getaway
description: Home to sun-kissed beaches, swaying palms, sculpted coral reefs, luxury resorts and thrilling water sports, the tropical paradise called Maldives is a string of beautiful islands.

name: Lakshadweep
title: Tropical Band of Islands
description: Settled off the Kerala coast on Laccadive sea, Lakshadweep translates to ‘a hundred thousand islands’. A club of 36 atolls and coral reefs, the nature tourism destination is known for preserved ecology and water sports.

name: Pondicherry
title: Tropical Band of Islands
description: A fascinating, small town with enough elements to charm its visitors, Pondicherry whose official name was changed to Puducherry in 2006, was once the largest French colony in India.

name: Kovalam
title: Scenic Beach Town in Kerala
description: Dotted with swaying palms and fondly known as the 'Paradise of the South', Kovalam is a tranquil seaside town nestled along the picturesque coastlines of the Arabian Sea.

name: Gwalior
title: The Land of Palaces
description: As the cradle of Indian culture and heritage for many centuries, Gwalior is a timeless treasure of art and music. The cityscape is adorned with historical monuments and a hilltop fort that are souvenirs of the dynasties that ruled here.

name: Thimpu
title: Scenic mountain destination in Bhutan
description: Thimpu will fascinate you with its rich heritage. you will love lively festivals, lush valley. Also popular wildlife destination.

name: Mysore
title: Scenic royal city in Karnataka
description: City of Palaces with its vibrant history , arts and culture. Allures tourists with its majestic beauty, landscaped gardens

name: Hampi
title: Open Air museuam in Karnataka
description: UNESCO recognised world heritage site. Attracts backpackers and pilgrims alike to witness its forts and temples.

name: Kochi
title: Open port city in Kerala
description: City steeped in heritage. It hosts many beaches worth exploring. With hot and humid weather.

name: Havelock island
title: Picturesque tropical Gateway in Andamans
description: Celebrate your love in havelock islands. Offers you lots of adventurous activities

name: Srinagar
title: Paradise on the banks of Jhelam
description: Dreamy honeymoon with endless sightseeing and lively festivals.

name: Manali
title: Say hello to hippie valleys and scenic villages
description: Enjoy your honeymoon days with  many adventureous sports and waterfalls.

name: Munnar
title: Exotic Tea Paradise in Kerala
description: Spend your romatic days at Munnar. A wildlife destination with pleasant weather throuhout the day

name: Goa
title: Popular homeymoon destination with beaches and nightlife
description: Head to Goa for romantic honeymoon. Enjoy the breeze and indulge in adventure activies in Goa

name: Amritsar
title: Spiritual capital of Punjab
description: Soak in the mystic hues of Amritsar, a famous pilgrimage spot! You will love exploring sightseeing attractions and attending various festivals. The local cuisines at Amritsar are worth trying out too.

name: Guwahati
title: Assam's largest city
description: Located on the banks of River Brahmaputra against the backdrop of mighty Himalayan Ranges, Guwahati will steal your heart with its magnificent ancient temples, stunning hills, diverse wildlife and sprawling tea plantations.

name: Rameshwaram
title: Pilgrimage site in Tamil Nadu
description: Rameshwaram glistens with sheer divinity. You can expect sunny afternoons with bearable heat. Don’t forget to spend some time at the beaches of Rameshwaram.

name: Dubai
title: Ultramodern state in UAE
description: A mix of the modern living and traditional Arabic culture, Dubai is all things glittery with luxury malls, charming souks, cutting-edge clubs, gourmet restaurants and old-world eateries.

name: Singapore
title: Complete family destination
description: Unleash the adventure enthusiast in you at Singapore. You can expect moderate temperatures along with humidity. Singapore is also a popular wildlife destination.

name: Kasol
title: Mini Israel in Himachal Pradesh
description: The hill-hamlet of Kasol stands at over 1,580 meters above sea level, in Himachal Pradesh, and flaunts raw natural beauty with lush conifer forests, snow-capped Himalayan mountains and winding rivers.

name: Bangkok
title: Dynamic city of Thailand
description: Come and relish the culinary delights of Bangkok. You can expect high temperatures and humidity. Also, don’t miss the heritage structures at Bangkok.

name: Tokyo
title: Bustling metrolpolis in Japan
description: Tokyo is a haven for foodies. You will love the stunning cherry blossoms, fairs and festivals. Additionally, explore the rich heritage of Tokyo.

name: Hyderabad
title: City of Pearls
description: If you are a foodie, head straight to Hyderabad. You will love visiting historical monuments, going on city tours and shopping from vibrant markets. You can also admire the heritage landmarks at Hyderabad.

name: Alleppey
title: Nature lover's paradise in Kerala
description: If relaxation is what you’re after, head to Alleppey. You will love exploring the backwaters and houseboat stays. Don’t forget to spend some time at the beaches of Alleppey.

name: Maldives
title: A Stunning Tropical Getaway
description: Home to sun-kissed beaches, swaying palms, sculpted coral reefs, luxury resorts and thrilling water sports, the tropical paradise called Maldives is a string of beautiful islands.

name: Lakshadweep
title: Tropical Band of Islands
description: Settled off the Kerala coast on Laccadive sea, Lakshadweep translates to ‘a hundred thousand islands’. A club of 36 atolls and coral reefs, the nature tourism destination is known for preserved ecology and water sports.
